# OctogleHire

> The global talent platform for hiring pre-vetted software developers from 150+ countries.

OctogleHire connects companies with elite, rigorously vetted remote engineers — reducing hiring costs by up to 60% while delivering world-class talent in days, not months.

## For Companies

- Access a curated network of the top 3% of developer applicants
- Receive matched candidate profiles within 48 hours
- All contracts, payroll, IP agreements, and tax compliance handled end-to-end
- Risk-free trial period on every placement
- Transparent monthly rates with no hidden markups or recruitment fees

## For Developers

- Apply once and get matched with multiple global opportunities
- Earn above local market rates working with international companies
- Fully remote positions with vetted, remote-first companies
- Contracts and compliance managed — focus on your craft
- Specialisations include React, Python, Node.js, TypeScript, Go, Java, Next.js, Angular, AWS, Flutter, and more

## Hiring Pages

Technology-specific hiring pages are available at https://octoglehire.com/hire/{technology}-developers (e.g., /hire/react-developers, /hire/python-developers).

Role-specific hiring pages are available at https://octoglehire.com/hire/{role} (e.g., /hire/frontend-developer, /hire/backend-developer).

Country-specific pages are available at https://octoglehire.com/hire/developers-in/{country} (e.g., /hire/developers-in/india, /hire/developers-in/brazil).
